title: Signal Sciences Power Rules
description: A public repository of Signal Sciences power rules.

rule-packs.name: attack-plus-error
rule-packs.description: Correlates attack payloads with application error response codes to identify active attempts at exploiting an application bug.

rule-packs.name: prelude-to-phishing
rule-packs.description: A spike in requests from Google Translate may be an indicator that phishing attacks are imminent. Appropriate action would be to caution staff and site users.

rule-packs.name: aggregate-attack-payloads
rule-packs.description: Creates an attack payload signal, used to aggregate attacks for a single custom alert threshold to flag IPs to block subsequent malicious requests.

rule-packs.name: graphql-requests
rule-packs.description: Identifies and inspects requests associated with GraphQL. Inspections include: Requests to graphiql, which should never be enabled in production servers, GraphQL requests not properly formatted, Injection attacks on raw graphql posts, Nested queries that could be abused to cause a DoS.

rule-packs.name: cve-2014-0094-0112-0114
rule-packs.description: Detects RCE vulnerabilities in older versions of Struts, CVE-2014-0094, CVE-2014-0112, CVE-2014-0114.
